snippet.title: Project Kolo Weather based on temps, time of year
snippet.description:
http://gamejolt.com/games/rpg/project-kolo/32202/
Here we run threw some of the new weather code itself, as well as changing the storm system as it is by changing the temps, near the end we change the temps in a thunderstorm from 50F to 5F to show the change from rain to snow, then mix the temps up a few times to continue changing the dynamic weather based on the conditions, not changing the code or creating a new storm system to replace the old one. This is mostley for effeciency as there is less work on the system to process, just compare temp to ranges set, then change the particle system acordingly.
